title: Latency spikes
body: I've been having issues every since I patched my client to 6.22 and I'm not entirely sure what the cause is. I've tried opening up Wireshark and trying to find packets that were taking an oddly long time between hops but didn't notice anything out of the ordinary. Now I'm also going to say I only have a basic understanding of how the protocols work so it's a very real possibility I missed something less obvious. It happens usually a couple times a minute where ping goes from 20 to 150+. I saw that there was an issue on EU servers but I'm on the NA server. So I'm coming here to find out what my next step should be in resolving the issue.

replies.body: I'm not familiar with Wireshark, but it sounds like you are having some packet loss to me.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) instead to know what's going on for sure.  Make sure these logs are from the matches you are seeing these in, and let me know what you find!
I will have nice ping (around 34-40) then get random high spikes that are 100-400. It happens several times a day. I know it isn't my internet because my internet ping is in the 20s.

I am having packet loss so I'm going back and trying the common solutions. I removed and readded the firewall exceptions. It seems to have helped a bit but the problem is still there. I'm going to try resetting my gateway next.
